tooltip.amalgamation_matrix_controller: A machine that merge 4 items into one
tooltip.assembler: A machine that craft complex mutliblock controller
tooltip.deuterium_bucket: Deuterium is a stable isotopes of hydrogen
tooltip.fluid_boiler: A machine that consumes fluids to generate steam
tooltip.fusion_casing: A main casing for the fusion reactor.
tooltip.fusion_coil: A important component of the fusion reactor.
tooltip.fusion_glass: A glass for the fusion reactor.
tooltip.helium3_bucket: Helium-3 is a light, stable isotope of helium with two protons and one neutron
tooltip.multiblock_projector: A projector that renders multiblocks hologram
tooltip.solid_boiler: A machine that consumes burnable items to generate steam
tooltip.steam_bucket: Steam is a substance containing water in the gas phase
tooltip.structural_glass: A glass block which is used for building most multiblocks.
tooltip.tritium_bucket: Tritium is a rare and radioactive isotope of hydrogen
